line.text: Let me not to the marriage of true minds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Admit impediments love is not love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which alters when it alteration finds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or bends with the remover to remove
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O no it is an ever-fixed mark
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That looks on tempests and is never shaken
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: It is the star to every wandring bark
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whose worth unknown although his height be taken
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Love not Time fool though rosy lips and cheeks
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Within his bending sickle compass come
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Love alters not with his brief hours and weeks
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But bears it out even to the edge of doom
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If this be error and upon me proved
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I never writ nor no man ever loved
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
